EmailTemplate.name: After Account Name Change Email
EmailTemplate.subject: Account Name Change Approval
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear [Recipeint User],
The Account Name for {!Account.Name} has been changed. The change is from {!Account.Formerly_Known_As__c} to {!Account.Name}.
Please click on the following link to access the account on LinKreta, {!Account.Link}
Note:- This is a system generated email. Please do not reply to this mail.
